usage.cn: 见你所见，爱你所爱，生活不是缺少美，而是缺少发现美的眼睛。
usage.eng: You may obtain the world with love , you can also lose the world with hate.

usage.cn: 我外表看起来是如此强悍，可我内心是无可救药的浪漫
usage.eng: I might look like a tough chick and I am.But I'm also a hopeless romantic inside.

usage.cn: 为成就大事，我们需要的不只是行动，还要梦想，不只是计划，还要相信。–——Anatole France
usage.eng: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream, not only plan, but also believe."

usage.cn: 那个总是谈笑风生，看起来很开心的女孩，也是那个可能会一个人哭到睡着的女孩。
usage.eng: The same girl who laughs and talks a lot and seems very happy is also the girl who may cry herself to sleep.
